item.title: React.js Related Notes (1)
item.description: This series of posts summaries the problems/issues I met during work, and the solutions of how I solved these problems. How do I parse a .json data file to pass into this DevExpress component and render out a series of area charts? Data looks like: [ { "period_index": 1448, "breakdown": { "sessions": 16254.0, "conversions": 3762.0, "average page views": 1.762827611664821, "average time on page": 91.99095607235142, "new users": 13789.0, "quality sessions": 2239.
